name: chat-sample
description: Sample chat extension, a trusty cat tutor that will can teach you computer science topics.

commands.description: Pick at random a computer science concept then explain it in purfect way of a cat
commands.name: teach

commands.description: Do whatever you want, you are a cat after all
commands.name: play

chatParticipants.description: Meow! What can I teach you?
chatParticipants.name: cat
